remarks: Lemma for ~ dquart .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 6-May-2015.)
statement:
dquart.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) $.
dquart.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. CC ) $.
dquart.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. CC ) $.
dquart.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. CC ) $.
dquart.m $e |- ( ph -> M = ( ( 2 x. S ) ^ 2 ) ) $.
dquart.m0 $e |- ( ph -> M =/= 0 ) $.
dquart.i $e |- ( ph -> I e. CC ) $.
dquart.i2 $e |- ( ph -> ( I ^ 2 ) = ( ( -u ( S ^ 2 ) - ( B / 2 ) ) + ( ( C / 4 ) / S ) ) ) $.
dquart.d $e |- ( ph -> D e. CC ) $.
dquart.3 $e |- ( ph -> ( ( ( M ^ 3 ) + ( ( 2 x. B ) x. ( M ^ 2 ) ) ) + ( ( ( ( B ^ 2 ) - ( 4 x. D ) ) x. M ) + -u ( C ^ 2 ) ) ) = 0 ) $.
dquartlem2 $p |- ( ph -> ( ( ( ( M + B ) / 2 ) ^ 2 ) - ( ( ( C ^ 2 ) / 4 ) / M ) ) = D ) $.
